# core-tag

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Type                   | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `closeable` | `closeable` | Allows the tag to be closeable and removed from the view.                                                                                                                                                                                                     | `boolean`              | `false`     |
| `color`     | `color`     | Optional primary color of the tag. Defaults to `black`. Use the following `@color` in [core-primitives](https://unpkg.com/@core-ds/primitives/core-primitives.less) without `@color-`. Use: `color="blue"`, `color="green"`, `color="yellow"`, `color="red"`. | `string`               | `undefined` |
| `size`      | `size`      | The pre-defined tag size. Use: `"small"` or `"large"`. Default size is `"large"`.                                                                                                                                                                             | `"large" \| "small"`   | `"large"`   |
| `variation` | `variation` | The tag variation. Use: `"default"` or `"light"`. Default variation is `"default"`.                                                                                                                                                                           | `"default" \| "light"` | `"default"` |
